items.title: Wockhardt gets favourable recommendation from CDSCO for antibiotic for CABP
items.description: The Subject Expert Committee (SEC) of the Central Drugs Standard Control Organisation (CDSCO) has provided a favourable recommendation for Miqnaf (nafithromycin), the drug firm said in a statement.

items.title: Amicus Capital, others infuse Rs 125 crore into Equirus Group, enable Federal Bank's partial exit
items.description: The investment is the third equity infusion in the late Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed company after the investment by Federal Bank in 2018, the statement said

items.title: Swan's Shipyard appoints Vipin Saxena as chief executive officer
items.description: Swan's Shipyard is a subsidiary of Swan Energy Limited (SEL)
